mapper.select: SELECT `friend_request`.*, `users`.id, `users`.name, `users`.head, `users`.status, `users`.school FROM `friend_request` LEFT JOIN `users` ON `friend_request`.user_id = `users`.id WHERE `friend_request`.friend_id = #{userId} ORDER BY `friend_request`.create_time DESC
